groups.noSourceConnected: Connect an ITSM source to start analyzing tickets
groups.trainingDescription: Ticket groups will appear when training completes. This usually takes a few minutes.
groups.trainingFailedDescription: There was an issue analyzing your tickets. Please check your ITSM connection and try syncing again.

review.title: Review AI response
review.sheetDescription: Rita analyzed your KB and similar tickets to draft this response.

feedback.title: What was wrong with this response?
feedback.placeholder: Describe what was incorrect or missing...

noKnowledge.title: Nice start, knowledge missing
noKnowledge.subtitle: You've started reviewing AI responses for this cluster. Missing knowledge is likely impacting response quality.
noKnowledge.message: Without knowledge, AI responses may lack the context needed to meet expectations.
noKnowledge.proTip: Early reviews help identify the most important gaps to address when creating knowledge.

firstGood.title: Nice start, early signs look good
firstGood.subtitle: You've started reviewing AI responses for this cluster. Early feedback suggests responses are meeting expectations.
firstGood.message: Responses reviewed so far generally met expectations.
firstGood.proTip: Continued review helps confirm patterns across more tickets.

firstBad.title: Nice start, still learning
firstBad.subtitle: You've started reviewing AI responses for this cluster. Based on this session, some responses did not meet expectations.
firstBad.message: Some reviewed responses lacked the information needed to meet expectations.
firstBad.proTip: Reviewing a few more tickets helps surface patterns and edge cases faster.

subsequentGood.title: Responses look aligned
subsequentGood.subtitle: AI responses reviewed in this session consistently met expectations.
subsequentGood.message: Reviewed responses matched expected answers for this cluster.
subsequentGood.proTip: Consistent results contribute to automation readiness over time.

subsequentBad.title: Responses need improvement
subsequentBad.subtitle: Most AI responses reviewed in this session did not meet expectations.
subsequentBad.message: Several responses lacked the information needed to respond accurately.
subsequentBad.proTip: Improving knowledge coverage often has the biggest impact on response quality.

descriptions.partial: Based on reviewed responses, some replies still need improvement before automation is recommended.
descriptions.low: Based on reviewed responses, several replies need clearer or more complete knowledge
descriptions.notReady: Automation can't be recommended yet because no knowledge exists for this cluster.

autopilot.title: AutoPilot Recommendations
autopilot.description: Automate stages of a ticket resolution

enableAutoRespond.info: You can adjust or disable Auto-Respond anytime per ticket group.

knowledgeGap.title: Knowledge Gap Detected
knowledgeGap.description: No knowledge articles found for this cluster. Rita recommends creating one to enable Auto-Answer.

comingSoon.title: Tickets coming soon
comingSoon.description: Leverage your existing ITSM data for intelligent analysis.
comingSoon.details: RITA enable historical tickets into quickly analyze patterns, improve responses, and strengthen automation for common L1/L2 tickets.
